00036 void Couplage_U::initialize()
00037 {
00038   for(int i=0; i<nb_problemes(); i++)
00039     probleme(i).initialize();
00040 }

00048 double Couplage_U::presentTime() const
00049 {
00050   assert(nb_problemes()>0);
00051   return probleme(0).presentTime();

00054 bool Couplage_U::initTimeStep(double dt)
00055 {
00056   bool ok=true;
00057   for(int i=0; i<nb_problemes(); i++)
00058     ok = ok && probleme(i).initTimeStep(dt);
00059   return ok;

00080 bool Couplage_U::isStationary() const
00081 {
00082   bool stat=true;
00083   for(int i=0; i<nb_problemes(); i++)
00084     stat = stat && probleme(i).isStationary();
00085   return stat;
00086 }

00100 
00101 bool Couplage_U::iterateTimeStep(bool& converged)
00102 {
00103   bool ok=true;
00104   converged=true;
00105   for(int i=0; i<nb_problemes(); i++)
00106     {
00107       bool cv;
00108       ok = ok && probleme(i).iterateTimeStep(cv);
00109       converged = converged && cv;
00110     }
00111   return ok;
00112 }

00172 REF(Field_base) Couplage_U::findInputField(const Nom& name) const
00173 {
00174   REF(Field_base) ch;
00175   for (int i=0; i<nb_problemes(); i++)
00176     {
00177       ch=probleme(i).findInputField(name);
00178       if (ch.non_nul())
00179         return ch;
00180     }
00181   return ch;
00182 }
00183 REF(Champ_Generique_base) Couplage_U::findOutputField(const Nom& name) const
00184 {
00185   REF(Champ_Generique_base) ch;
00186   for (int i=0; i<nb_problemes(); i++)
00187     {
00188       ch=probleme(i).findOutputField(name);
00189       if (ch.non_nul())
00190         return ch;
00191     }
00192   return ch;
00193 }

00215 
00216 int Couplage_U::indice_probleme(const Nom& nom_pb) const
00217 {
00218   int i=0;
00219   while ((i< nb_problemes()))
00220     {
00221       if(probleme(i).le_nom()==nom_pb)
00222         {
00223           return i;
00224         }
00225       i++;
00226     }
00227   Cerr << "Problem " << nom_pb
00228        << " not found in Couplage_U " << le_nom() << finl;
00229   exit();
00230 // Avoid compiler warning
00231   return 0;
00232 }
